profile.name: Jeremy Daer
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | @basecamp
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for systems programming and database management. Proficient in Ruby, Redis, Docker, and buildkite.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented scalable systems using Docker and buildkite for efficient deployment and management of applications.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple Rails-based web interfaces, including a Redis client for efficient data storage and retrieval.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of multiple open source projects, including Jekyll assets pipelines.
